forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers. Cloudy. Low around 31, with temperatures rising to around 34 overnight. East wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Snow Showers Likely then Rain And Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow showers likely before 9am, then rain and snow showers likely between 9am and 10am, then rain and snow showers between 10am and 2pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 47 in the afternoon. East southeast wind 12 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 51, with temperatures rising to around 61 overnight. South southwest wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between 1 and 2 inches possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 7am. Partly sunny, with a high near 65. West southwest wind 9 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow after 5am. Cloudy. Low around 24, with temperatures rising to around 27 overnight. East wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of around one inch possible

High near 40, with temperatures falling to around 35 in the afternoon. East wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of around one inch possible.

South wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 40. Southwest wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph.

High near 42, with temperatures falling to around 35 in the afternoon. Southeast wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. nubsNob.date: Closed due to a widespread power outage and major ice storm.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Closed for the season due to many down trees.
nubsNob.comments:
We are closed due to a widespread power outage. A major ice
storm has brought down thousands of trees in the area. It looks like power will not return for at least a few days. Updates will be posted here. Please stay safe and do not attempt to travel to Nub's Nob until it is safe to do so.
